The center of The circle of commerce. Or, A refutation of a treatise, intituled The circle of commerce, or The ballance of trade, lately published by E.M. By Gerard Malynes merchant Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.
[8], 32, 35-139, [3] p.
Printed by VVilliam Iones, and are to be sold by Nicholas Bourne at the Royall Exchange, London : 1623.
A reply to: Misselden, Edward. The circle of commerce. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by VVilliam Iones, and are to be sold by Nicholas Bourne at the Royall Exchange, London : 1623.
A reply to: Misselden, Edward. The circle of commerce. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
